name: dummy-loosesight-gc
description: A dummy package for demonstration purposes.

scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run compile

author: Your Name

dependencyNotes.context: This package is designed with awareness of dependency confusion attacks. Dependency confusion exploits scenarios where private package names overlap with public ones, allowing attackers to inject malicious code into builds.
mitigationSteps: Use strict version pinning for all dependencies.
Configure a private npm registry for internal packages.
Enable npm audit to monitor vulnerabilities.
Review dependencies regularly to ensure authenticity.
